summary.span: 表示三维空间中的 x、y 和 z 坐标点。

span.span: Represents an x-, y-, and z-coordinate point in 3-D space.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 XAML 中，的值之间的分隔符 可以是逗号或空格。In XAML, the delimiter between the values of a can be either a comma or a space. 某些区域性可能使用逗号字符作为小数分隔符，而不是句点字符。Some cultures might use the comma character as the decimal delimiter instead of the period character. 在大多数 XAML 处理器实现中，用于固定区域性的 XAML 处理默认为 en-us，并期望句点是小数分隔符。XAML processing for invariant culture defaults to en-US in most XAML processor implementations, and expects the period to be the decimal delimiter. 如果在 XAML 中指定了，则应避免使用逗号字符作为小数分隔符 ，因为这将与 属性值到其组件的字符串类型转换冲突。You should avoid using the comma character as the decimal delimiter if specifying a in XAML, because that will clash with the string type conversion of a attribute value into its components. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` -or ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *x**x* 此 的 x 坐标。The x-coordinate of this . *y**y* 此 的 y 坐标。The y-coordinate of this . *z**z* 此的 z 坐标 。The z-coordinate of this . ## Examples 此示例演示如何 使用重载减法 (`-`) 运算符和 静态方法来减去结构和结构 。This example shows how to subtract structures and structures using the overloaded subtraction (`-`) operator and the static method. 下面的代码演示如何使用 减法方法。The following code illustrates how to use the subtraction methods. 首先， 实例化结构和 结构。First, the structures and the structures are instantiated. 使用重载减法 (`-`) 运算符来减去这些结构，然后使用静态方法对其进行减法运算 。The structures are subtracted using the overloaded subtraction (`-`) operator and then they are subtracted using the static method. 接下来， 使用静态方法从第一个 结构中减去结构 ，最后 使用重载减法 () 运算符从中减去结构 `-` 。Next, the structure is subtracted from the first structure using the static method, and finally the structure is subtract from the using the overloaded subtraction (`-`) operator. [!code-csharp[3DGallery_procedural_snip#Subtract3DPointsExample_csharp](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/3DGallery_procedural_snip/CSharp/Misc3DOperationsExample.cs#subtract3dpointsexample_csharp)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此操作等效于将结构添加 到 具有相应的 、 和值的结构 。This operation is equivalent to adding a structure to a structure with the corresponding , , and values. 请注意， 仅当可以 直接更改、和属性时，调用方法才会起作用 。Note that calling the method will only have an effect if you can change the , , and properties directly. 由于 是一个值类型，因此，如果 使用属性或索引器引用对象，则会获得对象的副本，而不是对对象的引用。Because is a value type, if you reference a object by using a property or indexer, you get a copy of the object, not a reference to the object. 如果尝试对 属性或索引器引用更改、或，则会发生编译器错误。If you attempt to change , , or on a property or indexer reference, a compiler error occurs. 同样， 对属性或索引器调用将不会更改基础对象。Similarly, calling on the property or indexer will not change the underlying object. 如果要更改被 引用为属性或索引器的的值，请创建新的 ，修改其字段，然后将 返回回属性或索引器。If you want to change the value of a that is referenced as a property or indexer, create a new , modify its fields, and then assign the back to the property or indexer. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何偏移 结构。The following example shows how to offset a structure.
